type_media
 - id
 - name (image, video, sound)

type_media_format
 - id
 - type_media_id
 - type_media_format_duration_id (null for images)
 - aspect_ratio (width divided by height) (null for sounds)

type_media_format_duration
 - id
 - duration_seconds_min
 - duration_seconds_max

type_game_genre
 - id
 - name (action, horror, etc)

type_age_restriction
 - id
 - minimum age
